net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse

Class SQLiteHouseTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.SQLiteHouseTest

  • public class SQLiteHouseTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Exercises SQLiteHouse.
    Since:
    zerobandwidth-net/android 0.1.4 (#26)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  SQLiteHouseTest.NoIntrospectionClass
      Used by testFactoryFailureFromNoAnnotation() to verify that the SQLiteHouse.Factory will refuse to process a class that is not properly annotated.
      protected static class  SQLiteHouseTest.UpgradeSpecClass 
      protected static class  SQLiteHouseTest.ValidSpecClass
      Used as the canonical "valid" SQLiteHouse implementation for various unit tests.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static int CONNECTION_TIMEOUT
      Milliseconds until we give up on a connection to a database.

      Shorthand for obtaining a connection to a test database.

      Shorthand to delete the database specified by the given class.
      protected static android.content.Context getTestContext()
      Shorthand to provide a valid context for the unit test.
      void testDatabaseCreation()
      Ensures that, having opened a database connection and created the database for the first time, the file creates what we expected.
      void testDatabaseUpgrade()
      Ensures that the upgrade algorithm works, by swapping an upgraded table into the definition.
      void testDelete()
      Exercises SQLiteHouse.delete(SQLightable).
      void testDeleteFrom()
      Exercises SQLiteHouse.deleteFrom(Class).
      void testFactoryFailureFromNoAnnotation()
      Ensures that the class throws an exception if no annotation is provided.
      void testFactorySuccess()
      Ensures that the factory successfully processes the annotation.
      void testFieldDiscovery()
      Ensures that SQLiteHouse.processFieldsOfClasses() properly discovers annotated fields and ignores non-annotated fields.
      void testGetQueryContext()
      Exercises SQLiteHouse.getQueryContext(Class), which in turn exercises SQLiteHouse.getQueryContext().
      void testInsertion()
      Exercises SQLiteHouse.insert(net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.SQLightable).
      void testInsertionWithIDRewrite()
      Exercises SQLiteHouse.insert(net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.SQLightable), specifically examining whether the automatic rewrite of the auto-incremented row ID works properly.
      void testProcessResultSet()
      Exercises SQLiteHouse.processResultSet(Class, Cursor), which in turn exercises SQLiteHouse.processResultSet(SQLiteHouse.QueryContext, Cursor, Class).
      void testSearch()
      Exercises SQLiteHouse.search(SQLightable).
      void testSearchByStringID()
      Exercises SQLiteHouse.search(Class,String).
      void testSelect()
      Exercises SQLiteHouse.select(Class,long).
      void testSelectFrom()
      Exercises SQLiteHouse.selectFrom(Class).
      void testTableCreationSQL()
      Exercises SQLiteHouse.getTableCreationSQL(net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.SQLiteHouse.QueryContext<?>).
      void testUpdate()
      Exercises SQLiteHouse.update(SQLightable).
      void testUpdateTable()
      Exercises SQLiteHouse.update(Class).

                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Shorthand for obtaining a connection to a test database.
        Type Parameters:
        DBH - the test class
        Parameters:
        dbh - an instance of the test class
        Returns:
        an instance of the test class
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if anything goes wrong while connecting

      • testFactoryFailureFromNoAnnotation

      • testFactorySuccess

        public void testFactorySuccess()
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Ensures that the factory successfully processes the annotation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if anything goes wrong (implies test failure)

      • testFieldDiscovery

        public void testFieldDiscovery()
        Ensures that SQLiteHouse.processFieldsOfClasses() properly discovers annotated fields and ignores non-annotated fields. Also ensures that each table's primary key is discovered.

      • testTableCreationSQL

        public void testTableCreationSQL()
        Exercises SQLiteHouse.getTableCreationSQL(net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.SQLiteHouse.QueryContext<?>).

      • testDatabaseCreation

        public void testDatabaseCreation()
                          throws java.lang.Exception

        java.lang.Exception
